item.text: HQ, this is Red 7 on patrol. We've got a heavy storm front coming up - other than that, all is quiet.
We've got bogies! Hundreds of 'em! HQ! What are my orders?
Now all shall bear witness to my greatness! I hold their leaders powerless and their mightiest city is under my control.
Soon I will show this world a war the likes of which has never been seen! I will weed out the weak and inferior so that only the strong survive!
